Scrabble is a classic word game that has been enjoyed by millions around the world. It involves using tiles, each with a letter, to create words on a board. The game has evolved significantly over the years and has been adapted to the digital age with a range of Scrabble software tools available online.

Whether you want to take your Scrabble skills to the next level or simply want to play a game with friends or family, there is a plethora of options available to you. In this article, we will take a closer look at some of the best Scrabble software available today.

## Online Scrabble Software

### Scrabble Go

Scrabble Go is a free online Scrabble game that allows you to play with other players from around the world. It is available on iOS and Android, and you can also play it on your computer through Facebook. The game has a variety of modes, including a classic mode, a daily challenge, and a solo practice mode. Scrabble Go also provides tips and feedback, which can be helpful for improving your skills.

### Wordfeud

Wordfeud is another popular online Scrabble game available on iOS and Android. It has a built-in dictionary that enables you to check the definition of any word that you or your opponent plays. The game also has a chat feature that allows you to communicate with your opponents during gameplay.

### eScrabble

eScrabble is an online version of Scrabble that enables you to play against other players on the internet. It has a wide range of features, including an in-game chat, a dictionary lookup feature, and a rating system that tracks your progress.

## Mobile Apps

### Words With Friends

Words With Friends is a popular mobile game available on iOS and Android. The game is similar to Scrabble, but it has its own set of rules and a different board layout. Words With Friends allows you to play against other players or to play a solo game. It also has a chat feature and a dictionary lookup tool.

### Scrabble GO

Scrabble GO is the mobile version of the online game Scrabble Go. It has a similar range of modes to the online version and allows you to connect with other players from around the world. Scrabble GO also has a range of mini-games that can be played alongside the main game.

### Quarrel Deluxe

Quarrel Deluxe is a mobile game that combines elements of Scrabble and strategy games. Players must create words using tiles and then use those words to take control of territories and defeat opponents. The game has a range of single-player and multiplayer modes.

## Conclusion

Scrabble software is an excellent way to enhance your Scrabble skills and enjoy the game with others from around the world. Whether you prefer playing online or on your mobile, there are plenty of options available to you. By choosing the right Scrabble software for you, you can enjoy hours of fun and improve your vocabulary and word skills at the same time!
